properties.comment:
Process definition ================== Name : Measurment20111205 Duration : 8947
Process description: Prozess file zur Messung am 05.12.2011 an der Schaublin. Durchgef√ºhrt von AL und SZ.
Process parameters: SamplePeriod [s] : Sample period (used in this file) of the time vectors of the process parameters X1_d [mm] : Diameter of the part at the cutting position (adjusted by the X1 axis) X1_ap [mm] : Cutting depth (adjusted by the X1 axis) C1_n [rpm] : Rotational speed of the spindle (C1) Z1_v [mm/min] : Speed forward of the tool (Z axis) AxisBrakeCtrl [-] : Indicates if the axis brakes are engaged X1_v [mm/min] : Speed along the X-Axis LubFlow [kg/s] : Lubrication flow FClamp [N] : Force applyed by the tailstock Zero [-] : Zero element Tool [-] : Number of the tool ChipConv [-] : Chip conveyor on/off
